get.summary: Get users taking up a seat of a license

parameters.description: licenseId

parameters.description: displayName

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort by direction

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: entityId

get.description: Retrieves a list of license utilization

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: licenseId
parameters.description: licenseId that will be used for retrieving the utilization for this license, all to get utilizations for all licenses

entityId.description: Id of entity context for role assignment

groupId.description: Id of the group associated with the role assigned

productId.description: Id of product context for role assignment

roleAssignmentSource.description: Source of the role's assignment to the user

roleContextualId.description: Id, Product, Tenant, and Entity of the role

tenantId.description: Id of tenant context for role assignment

userId.description: Id of user for role assignment

userIds.description: Ids of users for bulk role assignment

username.description: Unique identifier for the user, typically used by the user to directly authenticate to the service provider. This identifier MUST be unique across the service provider's entire set of Users

active.description: A boolean value indicating the user's administrative status. The definitive meaning of this  attribute is determined by the service provider.

displayName.description: The name of the user, suitable for display to end-users. Each user returned MAY include a non-empty displayName value. The name SHOULD be the full name of the AuthUser being described, if known (e.g., 'Babs Jensen' or 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III') but MAY be a username or handle, if that is all that is available (e.g., 'bjensen').

lastLogin.description: When the AuthUser last logged in

tenantId.description: Id of tenant context for utilizations

entityId.description: Id of entity context for utilizations

licenseUtilizations.description: Array of license usage per license for specified tenant

updatedOn.description: When the License was last modified

officeId.description: ID for the customer's initial office entity

superAdmin.description: Name and emails for the super admin user for the customer

licenseIds.description: License the customer has paid for

resourceLimits.description: Limit on number of seats and potentially other resources

type.description: A label indicating the email's type

preferred.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred phone number or primary phone number. The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

updatedOn.description: When the License was last modified

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements
